an9.62:1: "Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Katame nava? Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ – ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an9.62:2: Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Katame nava? Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ – ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun"ti.
an9.62:3: Khemo ca amatañceva,Abhayaṁ passaddhiyena ca;Nirodho anupubbo ca,Dhammaṁ pahāya bhabbena cāti.
